comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Quentin Durward Corley, Sr. (January 21, 1884 - April 22, 1980) was a Texas circuit judge. ... On September 18, 1905 in Utica, New York he was in a railroad accident and lost both hands and one arm and shoulder. Within two years he invented and patented an artificial limb." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quentin_Durward_Corley
